title: [Patching, Downloads and End game lobby]
body:
so I am really loving the alpha client i think its amazing, I went back to the old one and I was like *goes back to alpha client* 
Patching the Client was super fast, and I like that you can go into the client and then it downloads the league files and it tells you how long til its done. For once its also not freezing my computer! the old client took forever and froze my computer, now I can patch it in the background and do other things :) thank you Riot :D 
Actually even just downloading and patching and all that is working heaps better than the old client for me. 0 problems for once. <3 

[Some Stuff regarding Post Game Screen and Chat] 
I haven't noticed anything substantially wrong with the client but theres a few things here and there. Basically whenever I finish a game, the Client stays open and when the game finishes the client wont load the end screen it'll just be the same and says im still in game, i have to wait a few minutes for it to load. Not sure if this is just my computer or other people are experiencing it as well. 

 I find it weird that new messages dont go to the top of your inbox, I end up thinking a message someone sent me was old or an old one was new. 

That's all I have to report I guess. 
[Back to Alpha Client I go!] {{summoner:6}}
